_header: Examples fair ye find in nature
Subjects: women, as speakers/narrators; women, authors; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: ‘A Woman’s Reply to Her Lover’ — thirteen stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC599.First Lines:
Ensamples fayre ye fynde in natureOf plantys smale commeth trees
                    huge and strong…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…As in wordes trauersyng the kyngI pray to god foule fall
                    dissemblyng
